resources.string: Vamsi Type Institute, Perala, Chirala, Andhra Pradesh

Vamsi Type Institute offers Type Writing Courses in English and Telugu. Institute is recognized by the State Board of Technical Education, Andhra Pradesh. Institue is running successfully from more than 30 years. 

Courses Offered are : 
 TypeWriting English Lower (30 WPM) 
 TypeWriting Telugu Lower (25 WPM) 
 TypeWriting English Higher (45 WPM) 
 TypeWriting Telugu Higher (40 WPM)
